Package org.apache.turbine.modules.navigations

Klasse VelocityNavigation

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.modules.navigations.TemplateNavigation
org.apache.turbine.modules.navigations.VelocityNavigation
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Assembler, Navigation
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
LegacyVelocityNavigation
public class VelocityNavigation extends TemplateNavigation
VelocityNavigation. This screen relies on the VelocityPage being set as the default page. The doBuildTemplate() assumes the user has put the template filename in the RunData parameter and set it to the value of the template file to execute. Specialized Navigations screens should extend this class and override the doBuildTemplate( data , context) method.
Version:
$Id$
Autor:
Dave Bryson, Henning P. Schmiedehausen, Peter Courcoux

    • doBuildTemplate

      protected void doBuildTemplate(PipelineData pipelineData, org.apache.velocity.context.Context context) throws Exception
      Velocity Navigations extending this class should override this method to perform any particular business logic and add information to the context.
      Parameter:
      pipelineData - Turbine information.
      context - Context for web pages.
      Löst aus:
      Exception - a generic exception.

    • doBuildTemplate

      protected void doBuildTemplate(PipelineData pipelineData) throws Exception
      Needs to be implemented to make TemplateNavigation like us. The actual method that you should override is the one with the context in the parameter list.
      Angegeben von:
      doBuildTemplate in Klasse TemplateNavigation
      Parameter:
      pipelineData - Turbine information.
      Löst aus:
      Exception - a generic exception.
